mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter from C. M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated July 7, 1861, to “My Very Dear Wife,” sent from Bradleys on Picket near Camp Pickens from C. M. Stigleman, 1 original piece, 4 written pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
